### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=52.0, y=-84.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=52.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=52.0, y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=62.0, y=-54.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=10.0, y=10.0) 

### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of 
-  Steam engine (position x=5.5, y=0.5)
-  Small electric pole (position x=7.5, y=-0.5)
-  Small electric pole (position x=7.5, y=0.5)
-  Small electric pole (position x=7.5, y=2.5)
-  Small electric pole (position x=3.5, y=0.5)
-  Small electric pole (position x=3.5, y=2.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-8.5, y=24.5)
Consists of 
-  Offshore pump (position x=-8.5, y=24.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=-8.5, y=23.5) connected to offshore pump

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
-  Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected before attempting to connect them.
-  Make sure that there are no obstacles or other entities blocking the connection.

### Errors when placing entities
-  Check that the target position is empty and not occupied by another entity before attempting to place an entity.
-  Ensure that the terrain at the target position is suitable for placing the entity.

### Errors when crafting items
-  Verify that all required sub-ingredients are available before attempting to craft an item.
-  Make sure that the recipe for the item exists and that all required ingredients are available.

### Errors when inserting items into entities
-  Check that the entity can accept the item being inserted.
-  Ensure that the entity has available space for the item being inserted.

### Errors when using pipes
-  Make sure that the pipe is connected to a valid fluid source and destination.
-  Verify that the pipe is not blocked by other entities or obstacles.
